Environmental Restoration Science.1: Describe in detail, the chemical and biological process that act on a chemical once it is released into the soil-water environment.
Environmental Restoration Science.2: Identify the contributing factors that can lead to ground or surface water contamination and offer corrective actions to mitigate the situation.
Environmental Restoration Science.3: Use science-based principles to measure, describe, manage and improve soil-water environments.
Environmental Restoration Science.4: Competitively pursue employment as an environmental scientist or soil scientist with government agencies or private-sector firms.
